projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React, ASP.NET Core, and SQL Server
projects.details: This project showcases a modern e-commerce platform built with a React frontend and ASP.NET Core backend. It features a responsive design, real-time inventory management, and secure payment processing. The application utilizes SQL Server for robust data storage and retrieval, ensuring high performance even with large product catalogs.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: Efficient task tracking and team collaboration platform
projects.details: This task management system is designed to boost team productivity and streamline project workflows. Built with C# and .NET, it leverages Azure cloud services for scalability and reliability. Key features include real-time updates, customizable workflows, and detailed analytics to track team performance and project progress.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard for real-time data analysis
projects.details: This data visualization tool transforms complex datasets into intuitive, interactive visualizations. Using D3.js and React, it offers a range of chart types and customization options. The dashboard integrates with various data sources through a WebSocket connection, enabling real-time updates and allowing users to make data-driven decisions quickly.
